channel.title: Comments on: Internet Facing Reporting Services Instance

item.title: By: mahendra
item.dc:creator: mahendra
item.description: hellow sir, I want to know,how it is possible to see ssrs report deployed on my office's SQL SERVER from home over internet?
item.content:encoded:
hellow sir,
I want to know,how it is possible to see ssrs report deployed on my office’s SQL SERVER from home over internet?
